58:["$","span",null,{"className":"line","children":["$","span",null,{"children":"🌈 Where every ending opens up a new start."}]}]
59:["$","p",null,{"children":"Data is the most valuable asset in LLM development. When building a dataset, we target the three following characteristics:"}]
5a:["$","ul",null,{"children":["\n",["$","li",null,{"children":[["$","strong",null,{"children":"Accuracy"}],": Samples should be factually correct and relevant to their corresponding instructions. This can involve using solvers for math and unit tests for code."]}],"\n",["$","li",null,{"children":[["$","strong",null,{"children":"Diversity"}],": You want to cover as many use cases as possible to make sure you're never out of distribution. High diversity is essential as it leads to better generalization."]}],"\n",["$","li",null,{"children":[["$","strong",null,{"children":"Complexity"}],": Answers should be both detailed (to maximize helpfulness) and include system 2 techniques like chain of thought (to force step-by-step reasoning)."]}],"\n"]}]
5b:["$","p",null,{"children":"Measuring accuracy is easy in most cases but near-impossible with open-ended, subjective questions. On the other hand, clustering datasets by topic is a good way of evaluating data mixture diversity. Finally, complexity can be assessed using other LLMs acting like judges."}]

5f:["$","p",null,{"children":"Once a model has been pre-trained on a next-token prediction task, Supervised Fine-Tuning (SFT) is used to turn it into an assistant capable of answering questions and following instructions. These datasets contain pairs of instructions and outputs to train LLMs to understand conversational structure. Unless otherwise noted, all datasets listed here are under permissive licenses (Apache 2.0, MIT, CC-BY-4.0, etc.)."}]

Decontamination is done in the same way as StarCoder (",["$","$L13",null,{"href":"https://github.com/bigcode-project/bigcode-dataset/tree/main/decontamination","children":"bigcode decontamination process"}],"). See ",["$","$L13",null,{"href":"https://arxiv.org/abs/2312.02120","children":"Magicoder paper"}],"."]}]]}],["$","tr",null,{"children":[["$","td",null,{"children":["$","$L13",null,{"href":"https://huggingface.co/datasets/gretelai/synthetic_text_to_sql","children":"synthetic_tex_to_sql"}]}],["$","td",null,{"children":"100k"}],["$","td",null,{"children":"Gretel.ai"}],["$","td",null,{"children":"Apr 2024"}],["$","td",null,{"children":"Synthetic text-to-SQL samples (~23M tokens), covering diverse domains."}]]}],["$","tr",null,{"children":[["$","td",null,{"children":["$","$L13",null,{"href":"https://huggingface.co/datasets/b-mc2/sql-create-context","children":"sql-create-context"}]}],["$","td",null,{"children":"78.6k"}],["$","td",null,{"children":"b-mc2"}],["$","td",null,{"children":"Apr 2023"}],["$","td",null,{"children":["Cleansed and augmented version of the ",["$","$L13",null,{"href":"https://huggingface.co/datasets/wikisql","children":"WikiSQL"}]," and ",["$","$L13",null,{"href":"https://huggingface.co/datasets/spider","children":"Spider"}]," datasets."]}]]}],["$","tr",null,{"children":[["$","td",null,{"children":["$","$L13",null,{"href":"https://huggingface.co/datasets/m-a-p/Code-Feedback","children":"Code-Feedback"}]}],["$","td",null,{"children":"66.4k"}],["$","td",null,{"children":"Zheng et al."}],["$","td",null,{"children":"Feb 2024"}],["$","td",null,{"children":["Diverse Code Interpreter-like dataset with multi-turn dialogues and interleaved text and code responses. See ",["$","$L13",null,{"href":"https://arxiv.org/abs/2402.14658","children":"OpenCodeInterpreter paper"}],"."]}]]}],"$L88","$L89"]}]]}]}]
69:["$","h3",null,{"className":"flex scroll-m-28 flex-row items-center gap-2","id":"instruction-following","children":[["$","a",null,{"data-card":"","href":"#instruction-following","className":"peer","children":"Instruction following"}],["$","svg",null,{"ref":"$undefined","xmlns":"http://www.w3.org/2000/svg","width":24,"height":24,"viewBox":"0 0 24 24","fill":"none","stroke":"currentColor","strokeWidth":2,"strokeLinecap":"round","strokeLinejoin":"round","className":"lucide size-3.5 shrink-0 text-fd-muted-foreground opacity-0 transition-opacity peer-hover:opacity-100","aria-label":"Link to section","children":[[["$","path","1cjeqo",{"d":"M10 13a5 5 0 0 0 7.54.54l3-3a5 5 0 0 0-7.07-7.07l-1.72 1.71"}],["$","path","19qd67",{"d":"M14 11a5 5 0 0 0-7.54-.54l-3 3a5 5 0 0 0 7.07 7.07l1.71-1.71"}]],"$undefined"]}]]}]
6a:["$","p",null,{"children":"Instruction following corresponds to the ability to properly follow constraints in the user prompt, such as \"write only two paragraphs\", \"write your answer in French\", etc. Strong instruction-following capabilities is a must-have for modern LLMs."}]
6b:["$","div",null,{"className":"relative overflow-auto prose-no-margin my-6","children":["$","table",null,{"children":[["$","thead",null,{"children":["$","tr",null,{"children":[["$","th",null,{"children":"Dataset"}],["$","th",null,{"children":"#"}],["$","th",null,{"children":"Authors"}],["$","th",null,{"children":"Date"}],["$","th",null,{"children":"Notes"}]]}]}],["$","tbody",null,{"children":[["$","tr",null,{"children":[["$","td",null,{"children":["$","$L13",null,{"href":"https://huggingface.co/datasets/Post-training-Data-Flywheel/AutoIF-instruct-61k-with-funcs","children":"AutoIF-instruct-61k-with-funcs"}]}],["$","td",null,{"children":"61.5k"}],["$","td",null,{"children":"Diao et al."}],["$","td",null,{"children":"Oct 2024"}],["$","td",null,{"children":["Samples generated with ",["$","$L13",null,{"href":"https://github.com/shizhediao/Post-Training-Data-Flywheel/tree/main/IF-generation","children":"this code"}]," and gpt-4o-mini, based on Qwen's ",["$","$L13",null,{"href":"https://github.com/QwenLM/AutoIF","children":"AutoIF"}]," library."]}]]}],["$","tr",null,{"children":[["$","td",null,{"children":["$","$L13",null,{"href":"https://huggingface.co/datasets/argilla/ifeval-like-data","children":"ifeval-like-data"}]}],["$","td",null,{"children":"56.3k"}],["$","td",null,{"children":"Argilla"}],["$","td",null,{"children":"Oct 2024"}],["$","td",null,{"children":"Only use the \"filtered\" subset. 6f:["$","h3",null,{"className":"flex scroll-m-28 flex-row items-center gap-2","id":"agent--function-calling","children":[["$","a",null,{"data-card":"","href":"#agent--function-calling","className":"peer","children":"Agent & Function calling"}],["$","svg",null,{"ref":"$undefined","xmlns":"http://www.w3.org/2000/svg","width":24,"height":24,"viewBox":"0 0 24 24","fill":"none","stroke":"currentColor","strokeWidth":2,"strokeLinecap":"round","strokeLinejoin":"round","className":"lucide size-3.5 shrink-0 text-fd-muted-foreground opacity-0 transition-opacity peer-hover:opacity-100","aria-label":"Link to section","children":[[["$","path","1cjeqo",{"d":"M10 13a5 5 0 0 0 7.54.54l3-3a5 5 0 0 0-7.07-7.07l-1.72 1.71"}],["$","path","19qd67",{"d":"M14 11a5 5 0 0 0-7.54-.54l-3 3a5 5 0 0 0 7.07 7.07l1.71-1.71"}]],"$undefined"]}]]}]
70:["$","p",null,{"children":"Function calling allows large language models (LLMs) to execute predefined functions with parameters inferred from user prompts, rather than generating standard text responses. This enables LLMs to seamlessly integrate with external systems, perform complex operations, and provide more accurate and contextually relevant responses."}]
71:["$","div",null,{"className":"relative overflow-auto prose-no-margin my-6","children":["$","table",null,{"children":[["$","thead",null,{"children":["$","tr",null,{"children":[["$","th",null,{"children":"Dataset"}],["$","th",null,{"children":"#"}],["$","th",null,{"children":"Authors"}],["$","th",null,{"children":"Date"}],["$","th",null,{"children":"Notes"}]]}]}],["$","tbody",null,{"children":[["$","tr",null,{"children":[["$","td",null,{"children":["$","$L13",null,{"href":"https://huggingface.co/datasets/glaiveai/glaive-function-calling-v2","children":"glaive-function-calling-v2"}]}],["$","td",null,{"children":"113k"}],["$","td",null,{"children":"Sahil Chaudhary"}],["$","td",null,{"children":"Sep 2023"}],["$","td",null,{"children":["High-quality dataset with pairs of instructions and answers in different languages. 76:["$","p",null,{"children":"Unlike instruction data, preference datasets consist of chosen and rejected answers. Preference alignment is used to align LLM's answers with human preferences to adopt the desired style and values."}]
77:["$","div",null,{"className":"relative overflow-auto prose-no-margin my-6","children":["$","table",null,{"children":[["$","thead",null,{"children":["$","tr",null,{"children":[["$","th",null,{"children":"Dataset"}],["$","th",null,{"children":"#"}],["$","th",null,{"children":"Authors"}],["$","th",null,{"children":"Date"}],["$","th",null,{"children":"Notes"}]]}]}],["$","tbody",null,{"children":[["$","tr",null,{"children":[["$","td",null,{"children":["$","$L13",null,{"href":"https://huggingface.co/datasets/Skywork/Skywork-Reward-Preference-80K-v0.2","children":"Skywork-Reward-Preference-80K-v0.2"}]}],["$","td",null,{"children":"77k"}],["$","td",null,{"children":"Skywork"}],["$","td",null,{"children":"2024"}],["$","td",null,{"children":"Preference pairs compiled from public sources like HelpSteer2, OffsetBias, WildGuard, and Magpie."}]]}],["$","tr",null,{"children":[["$","td",null,{"children":["$","$L13",null,{"href":"https://huggingface.co/datasets/argilla/ultrafeedback-binarized-preferences-cleaned","children":"ultrafeedback-binarized-preferences-cleaned"}]}],["$","td",null,{"children":"61.1k"}],["$","td",null,{"children":"Argilla"}],["$","td",null,{"children":"2023"}],["$","td",null,{"children":"Decontaminated version of the UltraChat dataset, scored by GPT-4 and binarized into \"chosen\" and \"rejected\" answers based on these scores."}]]}],["$","tr",null,{"children":[["$","td",null,{"children":["$","$L13",null,{"href":"https://huggingface.co/datasets/BAAI/Infinity-Preference","children":"Infinity-Preference"}]}],["$","td",null,{"children":"59k"}],["$","td",null,{"children":"BAAI"}],["$","td",null,{"children":"Sep 2024"}],["$","td",null,{"children":"Adjusts preference attribute weights per task using Infinity-Instruct's labeling system.
